# tabSetPanel_dsfr_template

```{r function-tabSetPanel_dsfr_template}
#' tabSetPanel_dsfr_template
#'
#' @importFrom htmltools htmlTemplate
#' @return html
#' @noRd
tabSetPanel_dsfr_template <- function(
  li = NULL,
  divs = NULL
    ) {
  # Le tabset complet
  htmltools::htmlTemplate(
    filename = system.file(
      get_dsfr_version(with_v = TRUE),
      "composant",
      "tabsetPanel.html",
      package = "shinygouv"
    ),
    li = li,
    divs = divs
  )
}

#' @noRd
panel_one_li <- function(
  id,
  content
    ) {
  htmltools::htmlTemplate(
    filename = system.file(
      get_dsfr_version(with_v = TRUE),
      "composant",
      "tabsetHeader.html",
      package = "shinygouv"
    ),
    id = id,
    name = content
  )
}
#' @noRd
panel_one_body <- function(
    id,
  content
) {
  htmltools::htmlTemplate(
    filename = system.file(
      get_dsfr_version(with_v = TRUE),
      "composant",
      "tabBody.html",
      package = "shinygouv"
    ),
    id = id,
    content = content
  )
}
tabSetPanel_dsfr_template(
  li = panel_one_li(
    "tab-1",
    "Tab 1"
  ),
  divs = panel_one_body(
    "tab-1",
    "Tab 1"
  )
)

```


```{r tests-tabSetPanel_dsfr_template}
test_that("tabSetPanel_dsfr_template works", {
  expect_true(inherits(tabSetPanel_dsfr_template, "function"))

  htmlfile <- readLines(
    system.file(
      get_dsfr_version(with_v = TRUE),
      "composant",
      "tabsetPanel.html",
      package = "shinygouv"
    )
  )

  #' @description Comparer les parametres par rapport a ceux de la version precedente

  nms <- names(
    as.list(
      args(tabSetPanel_dsfr_template)
    )
  )
  purrr::walk(
    nms[nms != ""],
    function(param) {
      with_moustache <- paste0("\\{\\{", param, "\\}\\}")
      expect_true(
        any(grepl(pattern = with_moustache, htmlfile)),
        label = paste0("sans moustache '", param, "'")
      )
    }
  )


    test_html <- tabSetPanel_dsfr_template(
      li = panel_one_li(
        "tab-1",
        "Tab 1"
      ),
      divs = panel_one_body(
        "tab-1",
        "Tab 1"
      )
    )


  #' @description tester si tous les params sont remplaces
  expect_false(grepl(pattern = "\\{\\{", test_html))

})
```


# tabSetPanel_dsfr

```{r function-tabSetPanel_dsfr}
#' tabSetPanel_dsfr
#'
#' @param id id du tabset/du tabPanel
#' @param ... liste de tabPanel_dsfr
#' @param title titre du tabset
#' @param content contenu du tabset
#'
#' @return html
#'
#' @export
#' @rdname tabPanel
#'
#' @examples
tabSetPanel_dsfr <- function(
  id,
  ...
  ) {
    if (missing(id)){
      stop("id is required")
    }
    contenu <- list(...)
    tabSetPanel_dsfr_template(
      li = purrr::map(contenu, ~ {
      panel_one_li(
        .x$id,
        .x$title
      )
    }),
      divs = purrr::map(contenu, ~ {
        panel_one_body(
          id = .x$id,
          content = .x$content
        )
      })
    )

}

#' @export
#' @rdname tabPanel
tabPanel_dsfr <- function(
  id,
  title,
  content
){
  list(
    id = id,
    title = title,
    content = content
  )
}

```

```{r examples-tabSetPanel_dsfr}
if (interactive()){
  library(shiny)
  shinyApp(
    ui = fluidPage_dsfr(
      tabSetPanel_dsfr(
        "coucou",
        tabPanel_dsfr(
          id = "tab1",
          title = "Une prems tab",
          content = tagList(
            h3("Coucou"),
            plotOutput("plot")
          )
        ),
        tabPanel_dsfr(
          id = "tab2",
          title = "Une deuxieme tab",
          content = tagList(
            h3("Salut"),
            plotOutput("plot2")
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    server = function(input, output) {
      output$plot <- renderPlot({
        plot(cars)
      })
      output$plot2 <- renderPlot({
        plot(iris)
      })
    }
  )
}
```
